#                                                                              #
# Events Congress Masters - maps to events.congress_master                     #
#                                                                              #
# Columns                                                                      #
# -------                                                                      #
#                                                                              #
# 1 = id                                                                       #
# 2 = org_id                                                                   #
# 3 = name                                                                     #
#                                                                              #
################################################################################
################################################################################

fasc, fbc, Fantasy Annual Super Congress
ferp, fbc, Fantasy Easter Red Points Congress
fcrp, fbc, Fantasy Christmas Red Points Congress
rasp, rbc, Rival Annual Super Congress
rerp, rbc, Rival Easter Red Points Congress
rcrp, rbc, Rival Christmas Red Points Congress
